item.title: How to build a basic slackbot: a beginner’s guide
item.description: Let’s try and automate something [in python] Photo by Rock’n Roll Monkey on Unsplash Update: code and tutorial updated on June 28 to reflect Slack API changes Slackbots: Why use them? Before we get into the tutorial part of this post, let’s take a look at why this can be a worthy project and tool. Slack is an increasingly popular tool for team-wide communication. It’s grown to include plugins for other widely used project management tools, like JIRA, Google Drive, and the likes.
